doc.title: While in Mexico
doc.plot: CHELSEA convinces her friend KATHERYN (KAT) to ditch school on Friday and drive down to Mexico where they will meet her brother ROB and her cousin, JOANNE at her family's bungalow. In Mexico, the group heads out to a club eventually splitting up. Kat meets DAN a seemingly harmless guy who tries to help Kat find her friends. Dan actually sees the situation as an opportunity to lure Kat to his house. At Dan's house, Kat realizes that she is in serious danger. She devises a plan and struggles her way out of the situation. By leaving his house Kat puts herself in even more danger
